response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprivacy #privatesphere #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for individuals' privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (private sphere), and #security highlight the importance of protecting personal information and bring attention to the issue.
